nodes.text: Galody and Tupit's home was a house owned by two Bothans named Galody and Tupit on the edge of the Smuggler Outpost on Endor.
Galody and Tupit's home was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
